name: Last Men Alive
description:
Playable by only two people in either a public or private room (you need to know the room name to join the "private" one).
Controls only for Mouse & Keyboard.

PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING:

I didn't have the time to make sure to state something like that, so I need to put it here.
Connecting:

To connect to a game, you need to always input your name in the Input Field on the top.
Then you need to decide whether you want to play a game with another random player, who's looking for a random player as well, by choosing the middle banner;
(Then, all you need is to wait for him to start the game, or start the game yourself with the button in the middle of the screen <only if two players are connected>)
OR
Use the right banner to play with a friend of yours. Then you just both input the exact same name of the room and then press "Survive" button beneath it.
(The button in the middle will prompt too, you can see if your friend connected and then press it to start)

In-game:

The bar on the right shows the distance between players. As said in the intro, you can't separate too much if you want to survive. 
The further you are from the other player, the stronger are the enemies.

At any time in-game, you can hold TAB to see the names of yours and your teammate's  (top left corner of the screen).

Created by Toroll
Follow me on my site, or itch.io, if you want to see progress on this and other games.
Wish I had a day more of time to add sounds, more animations, more maps and a goal.
For now, all you can do here is survive with a friend of yours, or a random player.
